header_text: You and your spouse have been married for a long time. Recently, you find yourself becoming easily angered with them over things that haven't made you upset in the past. Instead of fearing the future, you realize how your marriage is a commitment.

elements.Text: Reflecting on your relationship with your spouse, you feel...
